summary: Two individuals are standing side by side in a room, displaying their 'pre-summer stats' on the screen. They appear to be discussing their personal statistics, including relationship status, happiness levels, and physical attributes like height and weight. keywords: pre-summer stats, relationship status, happiness, height, weight, lyrics, song
